channel.title: linux on Remy-Ai's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Remy-Ai's Blog

item.title: Chapter2: Linus + Vim + Tmux
item.description: Basic commands of Linux ls : list files ls -l : list files with details ls -a : list all files ls -al : list all files with details ls -lh : list files with details and size in human readable format ls -alh : list all files with details and size in human readable format cd : change directory cd .. : change to parent directory cd ~ : change to home directory cd - : change to previous directory cd / : change to root directory cd PATH : change to PATH directory pwd : print working directory
